About Me

Sumner Willrodt is a designer and web developer based in Los Angeles. After graduating from the University of California Santa Barbara with an BA degree in Communications, she began traveling the world. What started as a curiosity for culture has turned into a passion for all things expressive, impactful, and untraditional. Sumner went on to study graphic design and web development and currently works as a designer in Valencia, California.
